1.0.name: wordpress/wp-twitter-mega-fan-box
1.0.description:
Twitter Follow Box is built over Twitter FollowBox jQuery Plugin. It helps wordpress developers / site owners to add facebook like box style widget for twitter. In this beta version, WP Twitter Mega Fan Box Widget supports following options.

  1. Settings page accepts your twitter username
  2. Width and height of widget can be changed based on your theme size
  3. Background color and text color of almost all fields can be changed
  4. Footer link can be customized

For more information on various plugins and development, visit my blog
